I will get a pic of the bike when I get home
I ride my bikecyle to school every day I was 14 at the time on my shitty bike it only had one working break and I was riding to school one day and I have to pass a elementary school that had a place to pull in and drop off your kids and I was in the bike lane going at a good speed but not too fast for the school zone and this ep pulls out of the drop off area doing a u turn to go the other way (there's sign every where saying you can't do that) and she pulls out and STOPS I only had about 2 seconds to slow down then I slammed into the car at not fast pace i hit the handle bars with my gut then I flew back and hit the tip of seat with my back and then I fall over I get up because of adrenaline and just book it after the car and because start to drive so she pulls over this is how it goes
Me: WHAT THE FUCK WHY WOULD YOU STOP
EP: IT YOUR FAULT FOR NOT STOPPING
I don't remember much about it because it was about 1 year ago
My mom was dropping off my sister and my mom pulls up after seeing my bike on the ground and she go up to me
Mom: What happend
Me: she pulled out and stop blocking the bike lane and I crashed into her I did not have time to stop (My mom is a bit of a dumb ass when I comes to this kindive stuff)
Mom: well it's your fault for not stopping
Me: TF SHE PULED OUT AND STOPED I ONLY HAD 2 SECOUNDS TO STOP
Mom: JUST GO TO SCHOOL I WILL DEAL WITH IT
Me: fine I will go
I go to the school office told them what happend they call the nurse and gave me a ice pack then that when the pain hits it was not too painful then I was told to goto class right after getting a ice pack I went into class sit down I am visibly in a bit of pain with a ice pack and my teacher asked what happend I told her she sent me back to the office told me to call my mom and to go home so I do that a ride home on that even more broken bike
So I go home and theres my mom I ask her did she be the info so we can make a claim she said no because it was my "fault" ( mom just did not care about me being in the right)
So I beg her to take my to the ER to get my back checked out she gives in and we go and I was told I was fine no x-ray or anything went back home and just sat in bed all day and my mom would not let me claim the crash and now I have back problems
Tl:DR so thinks it my fault for her pulling out and doing a u turn causes me to crash my bike and causes my to have back problems.
Call cps or ask a friend to call if you can't do it yourself or try finding a watch dog group that deals with this kindive stuff

Its prob a cpu over heat or it is a unplugged cpu fan if it the cpu fan (this is different on most mother boards) it will shut off like it's lost power around the time you login into Windows or when booting up it will give a warning that the fan is unplugged then shuts off or boots up no problems ( I took apart my laptop to fix a problem and had to take the fan off and forgot to plug it in and it did the same thing)
